SEARCH
Package beans

Class RequestBean

java.lang.Object
beans.RequestBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Named @SessionScoped public class RequestBean extends Object implements Serializable
Manages money request operations This bean handles the creation, acceptance, decline, and deletion of money requests between users.
Author:
Danilo Spera
See Also:

      public RequestBean()

  • Method Details

    • sendRequest

      public String sendRequest()
      Processes a new money request from the current user to another user. Validates the request details and creates a new RequestMoney entity if valid.
      Returns:
      null if validation fails

    • findUserByIdentifier

      private User findUserByIdentifier(String identifier)
      Searches a user by either email or variable symbol.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The email or variable symbol to search for
      Returns:
      User if found, null otherwise

    • resetForm

      private void resetForm()
      Resets the form fields after successful submission

    • addGrowlMessage

      private void addGrowlMessage(jakarta.faces.application.FacesMessage.Severity severity, String summary, String detail)
      Helper method to add messages to the Growl component

    • getReceivedRequests

      public List<RequestMoney> getReceivedRequests()
      Retrieves all money requests received by the current user
      Returns:
      List of received RequestMoney entities

    • getSentRequests

      public List<RequestMoney> getSentRequests()
      Retrieves all money requests sent by the current user
      Returns:
      List of sent RequestMoney entities

    • deleteRequest

      public void deleteRequest(RequestMoney request)
      Deletes a money request. Only the sender can delete their own requests.
      Parameters:
      request - The RequestMoney entity to delete

    • acceptRequest

      public void acceptRequest(RequestMoney request)
      Accepts a money request and processes the payment. Creates a transaction record and updates user balances.
      Parameters:
      request - The RequestMoney entity to accept

    • confirmAcceptRequest

      public void confirmAcceptRequest()
      Processes the request after user confirms to proceed despite budget warning. This method is called when user clicks "Proceed" in the budget warning dialog. It retrieves the stored request from view scope and processes it even though it exceeds the budget.

    • processAcceptedRequest

      private void processAcceptedRequest(RequestMoney managedRequest) throws IOException
      Helper method to process the accepted request. This method handles the actual processing of money requests, including: - Creating transaction records - Updating user balances - Removing the processed request
      Parameters:
      managedRequest - The request to process, must be a managed entity
      Throws:
      IOException - If redirect after processing fails

    • declineRequest

      public void declineRequest(RequestMoney request)
      Declines a money request and creates a declined transaction record.
      Parameters:
      request - The RequestMoney entity to decline

    • getAllRequests

      public List<RequestMoney> getAllRequests()
      Retrieves all money requests (both sent and received) for the current user
      Returns:
      List of all RequestMoney entities related to the current user

    • getFriendsList

      public List<jakarta.faces.model.SelectItem> getFriendsList()
      Gets a list of friends' names and emails for the current user. This combines friends where the current user is either user1 or user2. This method creates SelectItem objects that show the friend's full name in the dropdown while storing their email as the actual value.
      Returns:
      List of SelectItem with friend's name as label and email as value

    • onFriendSelect

      public void onFriendSelect()
      Automatically insert the email when a friend is selected from the dropdown.

    • getRecipientIdentifier

      public String getRecipientIdentifier()

    • setRecipientIdentifier

      public void setRecipientIdentifier(String recipientIdentifier)

    • getAmount

      public double getAmount()

    • setAmount

      public void setAmount(double amount)

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()

    • setDescription

      public void setDescription(String description)

    • addMessage

      private void addMessage(jakarta.faces.application.FacesMessage.Severity severity, String summary, String detail)
